verses.verse: Then <S%H227><s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> that he would <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the thick <S%H6205>darkness.<s%>
But <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2073>habitation<s%> for thee, and a <S%H4349>place<s%> for thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5975>stood.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who hath with his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H854>to<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Since <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> among <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> in, that my <S%H8034>name<s%> might <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> I any <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5057>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

But I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that my <S%H8034>name<s%> might <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> and have <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5973>in<s%> the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3588>Forasmuch<s%> <S%H834><s%> as it <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5973>in<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name,<s%> thou didst <S%H2895>well<s%> in <S%H3588>that<s%> it <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5973>in<s%> thine heart: <S%H3824><s%>

Notwithstanding <S%H7535><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> which shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> thy <S%H2504>loins,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> therefore hath <S%H6965>performed<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H1696>spoken:<s%> for I am risen <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H8478>room<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and am <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>promised,<s%> and have <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And in <S%H8033>it<s%> have I <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H8033><s%> is the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the presence <S%H5048>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his hands: <S%H3709><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H3595>scaffold,<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6967>high,<s%> and had <S%H5414>set<s%> it in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5835>court:<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> it he <S%H5975>stood,<s%> and kneeled <S%H1288>down<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven,<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> like <S%H3644>thee<s%> in the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> nor in the <S%H776>earth;<s%> which <S%H8104>keepest<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and showest <S%H2617>mercy<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> that <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee with <S%H3605>all<s%> their hearts: <S%H3820><s%>

Thou <S%H834>which<s%> hast <S%H8104>kept<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>promised<s%> him; and <S%H1696>spakest<s%> with thy <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and hast <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> it with thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>promised<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> There shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3772>fail<s%> thee a <S%H376>man<s%> in my <S%H4480>sight<s%> <S%H6440><s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> yet <S%H7535>so<s%> that thy <S%H1121>children<s%> take <S%H8104>heed<s%> <S%H853><s%> to their <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in my <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> thou hast <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.

Now <S%H6258><s%> then, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> let thy <S%H1697>word<s%> be <S%H539>verified,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> will <S%H430>God<s%> in very <S%H552>deed<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3557>contain<s%> thee; how much <S%H637>less<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1129>built!<s%>

Have <S%H6437>respect<s%> therefore <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H7440>cry<s%> and the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6419>prayeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee:

That thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> thou hast <S%H559>said<s%> that thou wouldest <S%H7760>put<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6419>prayeth<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

Hearken <S%H8085><s%> therefore <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H8469>supplications<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they shall <S%H6419>make<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> from thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4480>place,<s%> <S%H4725><s%> even <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and when thou <S%H8085>hearest,<s%> <S%H5545>forgive.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and an <S%H423>oath<s%> be <S%H5375>laid<s%> upon him to make him <S%H422>swear,<s%> and the <S%H423>oath<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thine <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%>

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> by <S%H7725>requiting<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> by <S%H5414>recompensing<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> upon his own <S%H7218>head;<s%> and by <S%H6663>justifying<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> by <S%H5414>giving<s%> him according to his <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be put to the <S%H5062>worse<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee; and shall <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> and make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%>

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> to them and to their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

When the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is shut <S%H6113>up,<s%> and there <S%H1961>is<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4306>rain,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee; yet if they <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H4480>sin,<s%> <S%H2403><s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> thou dost <S%H6031>afflict<s%> them;

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> thou hast <S%H3384>taught<s%> them the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they should <S%H1980>walk;<s%> and <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thy <S%H5971>people<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7458>dearth<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7711>blasting,<s%> or <S%H3420>mildew,<s%> <S%H697>locusts,<s%> or <S%H2625>caterpillars;<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6887>besiege<s%> them in the <S%H8179>cities<s%> of their <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H5061>sore<s%> or <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H4245>sickness<s%> there be:

Then <S%H3605>what<s%> <S%H8605>prayer<s%> or <S%H3605>what<s%> <S%H8467>supplication<s%> <S%H834>soever<s%> shall be <S%H1961>made<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> or of <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> his own <S%H5061>sore<s%> and his own <S%H4341>grief,<s%> and shall spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive,<s%> and <S%H5414>render<s%> unto every <S%H376>man<s%> according unto <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H853><s%> whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest;<s%> <S%H3588>(for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H905>only<s%> <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3824>hearts<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of men: <S%H120>)<s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> they may <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee, to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in thy <S%H1870>ways,<s%> so <S%H3605>long<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H5414>gavest<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> the <S%H5237>stranger,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> of thy <S%H4480>people<s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> but is <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H4480>country<s%> <S%H776><s%> for thy great name's <S%H4616>sake,<s%> <S%H1419><s%> <S%H8034><s%> and thy <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and thy stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm;<s%> if they <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%>

Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> even from thy <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4480>place,<s%> <S%H4349><s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H5237>stranger<s%> <S%H7121>calleth<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thee for; <S%H4616>that<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee, as doth thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1129>built<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> by thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou shalt <S%H7971>send<s%> them, and they <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee <S%H1870>toward<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H977>chosen,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1129>built<s%> for thy <S%H8034>name;<s%>
Then <S%H8085>hear<s%> thou <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and their <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> and <S%H6213>maintain<s%> their <S%H4941>cause.<s%>
